snippet: A border police officer has been charged with assault after he was filmed beating Tariq Abu Khdeir, a Palestinian-American teenager, on the edges of a violent riot in East Jerusalem in July.
abstract: Israeli Ministry of Justice reports that border police officer has been charged with assault after he was filmed beating Palestinian-American teenager Tariq Abu Khdeir on the edges of a violent riot in East Jerusalem in July.
lead_paragraph: A border police officer has been charged with assault after he was filmed beating Tariq Abu Khdeir, a Palestinian-American teenager, on the edges of a violent riot in East Jerusalem in July.

headline.print_headline: Israel: Officer Charged in Tampa Teenager’s Beating
